thread.title: WTF | Watch: 'Back to the Future Day' didn't go so well for Fox News host who got stuck in a Delorean
thread.title_full: WTF | Watch: 'Back to the Future Day' didn't go so well for Fox News host who got stuck in a Delorean - entertainment.ie

author: Lauren Murphy
title: WTF | Watch: 'Back to the Future Day' didn't go so well for Fox News host who got stuck in a Delorean
text:
So you thought you'd heard the last of 'Back to the Future Day' references once the clock struck midnight, eh? Well, sorry to bring it up yet again, but at least this story might give you a chuckle.
Fox News had a Delorean on set yesterday, where one of the hosts of their 'Fox & Friends' segment, Brian Kilmeade , dressed up as Marty McFly. They even enlisted Huey Lewis for the piece, as Lewis provided a song for the film's soundtrack, 'The Power of Love'.
Lewis was meant to open the car's door to allow Kilmeade to get out, but unfortunately it gets stuck, and things get a bit mortifying.
We bet he wishes that his time machine worked on this particular occasion. Arf.
Watch it below and prepare to cringe:
Via Raw Story
